data.text:
United, we can do so much more. Thank you to everyone donating in support of child well-being today, and to our friends at @delta for matching donations up to $100,000! 

To donate, visit: https://t.co/fQ9FRrGqpf #GivingTuesday #gagivesday https://t.co/2XeUL4hFV7
